attributes.action: Revoke mandatory calorie labelling on all menus
attributes.additional_details: I want the Government or Parliament to revoke this rule for the greater good of everyone
attributes.background: this is a terrible idea, we are so unhealthily obsessed with calories it won’t help anything, people should be able to eat with out worrying about the calories in it and this is also extremely harmful to people with eating disorders

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614396
